title: The Tyrant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Strongarm. Control them into visiting another target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB/CTRL Immune
- You learn the role of players you Strongarm.
- Your target is informed they were controlled.
- If the Frontier faction is in play, controlling a Frontier member into shooting another Frontier member does not contribute to Wrongful Death.
- If the Frontier faction is in play, you cannot control players to using revolvers unless they were already using one that night.

desc:
Post 5482
*A sheriff gone mad with power. He drank from the cup of authority and lost himself in a despotic stupor.*
